snippet: Judge Matthew A. Sciarrino Jr. of Criminal Court declined to dismiss charges against an Occupy Wall Street protester who was arrested after refusing to leave the park.
abstract: Judge Matthew A Sciarrino Jr. of Criminal Court in Manhattan declines to dismiss charges against Occupy Wall Street protester Ronny Nunez, who was arrested in November 2011 after refusing to leave Zuccotti Park; Sciarrino rules that park owner Brookfield Properties had the right to clear protesters to address deteriorating conditions on the property.
lead_paragraph: Judge Matthew A. Sciarrino Jr. of Criminal Court declined to dismiss charges against an Occupy Wall Street protester who was arrested after refusing to leave the park.

headline.seo: Judge Says Brookfield Had Right to Clear Zuccotti Park
headline.main: Owner Had Right to Clear Zuccotti Park, Judge Says
headline.print_headline: Owner Had Right to Clear Zuccotti Park, Judge Says
